duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively share knowledge and provide a positive customer experience, helping customers understand their insurance, identify gaps, and support them beyond regular business hours.
Effectively manage time and exhibit reliability and dependability in attendance in an ever-changing, fast-paced, contact center environment.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from internal and external customers.
Use technology and learning resources to deliver efficient problem resolution and reduce customer effort.
Participate in in-house or outside insurance/industry related courses/seminars to expand product/system knowledge.
Contribute to the achievement of individual performance, metrics, and goals while incorporating best practices from others.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred.
